Clip.Title: DECADENCE: DECLINE OF THE WESTERN WORLD
Clip.Episode: Decadence: Decline of the Western World
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This is a critique of life in the Western world today and the vaules we may now take for granted. Throughout history all civilizations rise and fall, is the West next?

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: From Wasteland to Motherland: Central Asia
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey through Central Asia, Russia and the Ukraine, and listen to the songs and stories of people who are longing to return to the homelands of their distant memories.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Her husband lies wounded, unable to walk, so Laura Secord sets out on a long journey to warn the British of a possible American attack.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tecumseh forges an alliance with the British in pursuit of his dream of a unified First Nations.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From scenic Telegraph Cove, around Cape Scott Provincial Park and beyond - Vancouver Island's Northern Coastline is one of the world's last, great wilderness frontiers.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The west coast of Newfoundland is a story of cultural history and beauty - from the first European settlements at l'Anse aux Meadows and Port au Choix, to the incredible, scenic beauty of Gros Morne National Park.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: DESIGN BY DECADE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The 1970's were a transitional time in Canada, and the designs from this period reflect this diverse decade.

Clip.Title: CITY GUIDES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow our City Guide as she takes us around the posh and trendy neighbourhood of Yorkville.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of Nova Scotia is a living historical record of the centuries-old battle between the French and the English in the New World, along one of the Atlantic's most remote, hostile coastlines.

Clip.Title: REVERSE EXPLORATION
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Palobi and Mudeya come from a tribe of Papua New Guinea. They launch on an expedition in the heart of a very strange civilization: 21st Century France.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
